Title: Lockdown
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Luke Del Tredici
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: The precinct goes into lockdown mode on Thanksgiving night, and Jake, who was left in charge, is confident in his ability to keep spirits high and avoid chaos. Amy is less confident, as things spiral out of control.
